pong.py: This file contains the main implementation of the Pong game using the pygame library. It initializes the game, handles user input, updates game state, and renders the game objects on the screen.

cli.py: This file contains the Typer CLI wrapper that allows the user to start the Pong game from the command line. It imports the main game logic from pong.py and provides a command-line interface to run the game.
